* Arkness, for once in a very long time, let her muscles relax and let the 
tip of the blade rest against the ground. That sword wasn't light!
Heaving a heavy sigh she put away the sword and turned towards Firearm as he 
drove up, smiling warmly at his salute.*

" At ease, Firearm."

* Folding her wings in at her sides, Arkness started to feel the strain of 
battle start to sink in, as well as alot of damage she hadn't had time to 
repair earlier.*

" But yes, go and repair yourselves. Get a good rest, you all deserve it."
